name: places/ChIJPy-d0Sn2wokR9WTQ0O7JEHE

displayName.text: Dr. George J. Bertero Jr, MD

formattedAddress: 697 West End Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 697 West End Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text:
Dr.Bertero is the BEST Physician I have experienced and KNOW!!

He is extremely knowledgeable and skillful in his field. Being in the health field myself I must say I have met many professionals but not one like Dr. Bertero. He is caring, and very DETAILED to my care and needs.
He explores the condition and offers the proper referrals to get to the bottom of  the problem.

He is also the only Professional I know that actually wrote the HIPPA law all by HAND! before he went to computers. Amazing dedicated and efficient physician he is.
I Highly recommend him. I no longer live in New York but live in P.A. and drive all the way for over 2 hours for my appointment.
I will never trade him and only because of distance will have to find another Doctor close to me in PA in case of an emergency, A task too painful to think about knowing that I have the best and am afraid of another doctor.
Thank you Dr. Bertero!
God bless you!
Brenda Torres-Wells
